attributes.action: Do not spend €200m on a “national flagship”
attributes.additional_details: There is no justifiable reason to spend this amount of money on what essential is a vanity project for the country.
attributes.background: Spend our money on pretty much anything else. The NHS, eduction, arts funding, even reducing the national debt would be better than this.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584822
